name: 戴骏豪
introduction: Ivan Tai (born July 28, 1994) is a Malaysian actor, journalist, and model. He is best known for his portrayal of Guo Xiang in River of Exploding Durians as well as a television reporter for Radio Televisyen Malaysia since 2015.Ivan was born in Malaysia, but was raised primarily Chengdu, living also in Guangzhou. He has won several popularity awards in China including "Top 100 Most Influential Child-Star" in 2009. Also, Ivan is an actor, known for My Tiny Time(2013).Aside from acting, Ivan has reported many news special reports for Radio Televisyen Malaysia. In 2017, Ivan founded his own production company, Viggou Media & Entertainment, where he directs music videos, short films, documentary and commercials.
